sql: SELECT func1, SUM(approved) as amount FROM ':memory:' WHERE transfer = 'Excluding transfers' AND Econ_func = 'Function' AND year = 2006 GROUP BY func1
SELECT func1, func2, SUM(approved) as amount FROM ':memory:' WHERE transfer = 'Excluding transfers' AND Econ_func = 'Function' AND year = 2006 GROUP BY func1, func2
SELECT func1, func2, func3, SUM(approved) as amount FROM ':memory:' WHERE transfer = 'Excluding transfers' AND Econ_func = 'Function' AND year = 2006 GROUP BY func1, func2, func3
